FuncDef: This command enables the BGP MED to be used to configure the RIP metric at the BGP to RIP transition on egress routers. BGP always configures the BGP MED to the RIP metric at the ingress router. Whenpropagate-metricis configured, the RIP metric at egress routers is configured as the BGP MED attribute added to the optional value configured with themetric-outcommand.
